instruction: Come up with an example of a home automation device that has internet of things features.
output: One example of a home automation device with internet of things features is the Amazon Echo. Amazon Echo is a voice-controlled device that allows users to control their lights, thermostat, security systems, and other appliances using voice commands. It is also integrated with services like Amazon Music, Spotify, and Audible, allowing users to control their music, listen to audiobooks, and get news updates. With the Echo's built-in smart home hub, users can control their devices without having to log into each device separately.
